name: Komodo Dragons & The Curse of Crystal
name_original: Komodo Dragons & The Curse of Crystal
description:
Game is currently in early beta.

Once peaceful land has been attacked by powerful warlock. As the bravest of Komodo Dragon Village warriors, you take long journey in order to defeat bad guys. smash enemies, jump platforms, avoid traps and collect treasures. Make your way through all ramping up in difficulty levels!

- inspired by old Tomb Raider games
- eight unique levels, each one leads to powerful boss
- numerous puzzles, which must be solved to go further
- contains secrets
